## Leaflet map \#3

***created on 07-NOV-2018***
```{r, eval=TRUE}
library(leaflet)
set.seed(2018-11-06)
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(2000, min = 4.55, max = 4.8),
                 lng = runif(2000, min = -74.1, max = -73.9))

jdIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbe-dev/ds_dummy/gh-pages/johnd0e.jpg",
  iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
  iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)

jdSites <- c("Thanks for reviewing the assignment")

df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions()) %>%
  addMarkers(lat=4.676973,lng=-74.042319, 
             popup=jdSites,
             icon = jdIcon
             ) 
```
